title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 50 - Mutual Trust Investment Companies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 50 - Mutual Trust Investment Companies

State Regulations

Regulation and Supervision (§ 50.1 to 50.5)

Accounting Records (§ 50.10 to 50.11)

Valuation Investments (§ 50.20 to 50.22)

Investments and Redemptions (§ 50.30 to 50.32)

Limitations (§ 50.40 to 50.42)

Liquidating Account (§ 50.50 to 50.52)

Termination (§ 50.60 to 50.62)

Miscellaneous (§ 50.70 to 50.72)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 50

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §
14[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
